column4: Can anyone help me fix my sound? The OS recognizes that the hardware is there, alsamixer is maxed out, but I can't get anything out of it.
00:1f.5 Multimedia audio controller: Intel Corporation 82801EB/ER (ICH5/ICH5R) AC'97 Audio Controller (rev 02)
open your media settings and check for pulseaudio
Do you mean System > Preferences > Sound?
I have installed PulseAudio Applet, it says everything is maxed, and the Volume meter reads that sound is being played, but nothing is coming out of the speakers
I fixed it by setting it to Audio 5.0 surround, thank you for your help!
I would remove pulseaudio, since it's a redundant layer just reprocessing
maybe pulsaudio works for your setup, but most onboard soundcxards don't benefit much from it
